de.thinktel.foragingBee.simulation
Class FoodSource

java.lang.Object
  de.thinktel.foragingBee.simulation.AbstractMovingAgent
      de.thinktel.foragingBee.simulation.FoodSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
IIterationAgent, IMovingAgent, IVisualAgent, java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable
public class FoodSource
extends AbstractMovingAgent

This class simulates a food source. The simulation is far away to be realistic because e.g. the nectar never exhausts. The behaviour may be more realistic in later simulations.

Changes:

  • 20090901: This class inherits directly from AbstractMovingAgent because the visualization for this object is defined in the MASON specific part of the simulation.

Copyright 2009 Joerg Hoehne

Author:
hoehne (Jörg Höhne)
See Also:

Field Detail

sizeFactor

private final double sizeFactor
A factor computed once to compute the current concentration of nectar in this food source.

initialConcentration

double initialConcentration
The initial nectar concentration in this source.

concentration

double concentration
The current nectar concentration in this source.

amount

double amount
The current amount of nectar in this source. The amount is the product of concentration multiplied with the size of the food source.

beeCount

int beeCount
A counter that will increased by beeLock() and decreased by beeUnlock().

refillFactor

double refillFactor
This factor determines the speed the nectar concentration is refilled until the initial value. This factor determines the fraction of the differenz of the current concentration to the initial one.

maxAbsoluteRefill

double maxAbsoluteRefill
The maximum value the refilling will happen every step. This value clamps the computed using the refillFactor variable.

Constructor Detail

FoodSource

public FoodSource(ForagingHoneyBeeSimulation simulation,
                  boolean is3dMode,
                  javax.vecmath.Point3d location,
                  double size,
                  java.awt.Color color,
                  double concentration)
The constructor for a food source. This constructor calls the constructor of the superclass by providing the food source's color.

Parameters:
simulation - The simulation where this food source resides in.
location - The location of the food source.
size - The size (diameter) of the food source.
color - The color of the food source.
concentration - The concentration of the nectar in this food source.
Method Detail

computeAmount

private void computeAmount()
Compute the amount of nectar in this food source. The amount is the product of the current concentration and the size of the food source.

getConcentration

public final double getConcentration()
Return the concentration of nectar of this source.

Returns:
the concentration

setConcentration

private final void setConcentration(double concentration)
Set the concentration of nectar of this source. By setting the concentration the amount of nectar is calculated. The amount is the concentration multiplied by the size.

Parameters:
concentration - the concentration to set

getNectar

public double getNectar(double amount)
Return the asked amount [µl] of nectar. If this source has less the maximum available amount is returned.

Parameters:
amount -
Returns:
The requested amount of nectar if available, less otherwise.

Set the refill factor that is used every step to increase the nectar concentration.

Parameters:

Get the maximum absolute refill value that clamps the by refillFactor computed value.

beeLock

public void beeLock()
A bee tells the food source about its locking (the bee is heading for the food source.

beeUnlock

public void beeUnlock()
A bee tells the food source about it unlocking (the bee is not heading for the food source anymore.

computeConcentration

private final void computeConcentration()
Compute the current concentration of nectar according to the food source's size and amount of nectar.

getBeeCount

public int getBeeCount()
Return the number of bees locked to this food source.

Returns:
The number of bees locked on this food source.

increaseConcentration

private final void increaseConcentration(double by)
Increase the current concentration by a certain amount. According to increase the concentration the amount of nectar has to be recomputed.

Parameters:
by - The amount the concentration will be increased.

step

public void step(sim.engine.SimState state)
This method is performed when the next step for the agent is computed. This agent does nothing, so nothing is inside the body of the method.

Parameters:
state - The SimState environment.
